metadata.title: CVE-2023-38314 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenNDS Captive Portal before version 10.1.2. Ithas a NULL pointer dereference in preauthenticated() that can be triggeredwith a crafted GET HTTP request with a missing redirect query stringparameter. Triggering this issue results in crashing OpenNDS (aDenial-of-Service condition).

criterions.comment: opennds package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
